def test_add_group_json(app, db, json_groups, check_ui): group = json_groups with pytest.allure.step('Given a group list'): old_groups = db.get_group_list() with pytest.allure.step('When I add a group %s to the list' % group): app.group.create(group) with pytest.allure.step('Then the new group list is equal to the old list with the added group'): new_groups = db.get_group_list() old_groups.append(group) > assert sorted(old_groups, key=group.id_or_max) == sorted(new_groups, key=group.id_or_max) E assert [211:name1:he..., 218:::, ...] == [211:name1:hea..., 218:::, ...] E At index 56 diff: None:name,J$<gaZuS:header zG:footer:8Xs$E zW=,6 != 274:name,J$:header zG:footer:8Xs$E zW=,6 E Use -v to get the full diff
